1.title: Episode #9.1

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Six farmers travel to the Hunter Valley to begin their search for love. Each farmer goes on five-minute speed dates with the eight girls he has chosen from hundreds of applicants, before selecting four girls to come on a 10 day stay at his farm.

1.title: Episode #3.1

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Six new farmers choose which people they will get to know closely during their farm stays. For the first time, one farmer is looking for a husband.

8.title: Episode #3.8

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: There are plenty of surprises in store as several farmers from the first two series return to bring us up to date with the latest on their relationships with the women they chose. The six farmers from the current series then reveal which people they chose to meet on their city visits, and how things have developed between them since then.

1.title: Episode #4.1

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Seven new farmers, including two who are father and son, begin their search for new wives by each going on 5-minute speed dates with ten girls, then choosing five of them to accompany them on a group date.

2.title: Episode #4.2

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: The seven farmers each go on a group date with their five chosen girls, then they choose three girls to join them on the farm.

3.title: Episode #4.3

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: The twenty-one girls chosen by the seven farmers begin their farm stays.

4.title: Episode #4.4

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: The girls have one final chance to impress their farmers before they each have to send one girl home.

5.title: Episode #4.5

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: The farmers treat their two remaining girls to some rest and recreation on the weekend.

6.title: Episode #4.6

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: The seven farmers face their moments of truth as the farm stays come towards an end.

7.title: Episode #4.7

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: The seven farmers and their remaining girls spend the last day together on the farm. One week later, the farmers head to the city to knock on the doors of the girls they have chosen. Then one month later, they return to where it all began as the farmers reveal which of them found love and which of them had their hearts broken.

1.title: Episode #5.1

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: A new batch of six lonely farmers, from the most remote parts of Australia ever, begin their search for love. Five of them are looking for a wife and one farmer wants a husband. The farmers each pick six singles, who have no idea where the farmers are from, for five-minute speed dates, then they choose three of their singles to go straight to the farm.

2.title: Episode #5.2

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: There is drama as the six farmers begin to get to know their three potential partners, as some partners get lost, others are stranded, and one romantic first date goes horribly wrong.

3.title: Episode #5.3

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: As the one-on-one dates continue, the partners have to face up to meeting the family and friends of their farmers. Some true confessions lead to one partner walking out, and one of the farmers is put in a spin by a developing love triangle.

4.title: Episode #5.4

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: The struggle for love intensifies and some hearts are broken as each of the six farmers has to farewell one of their potential partners, leaving two on each farm. For the first time, Natalie heads to the Australian outback to help one of the farmers make an important decision.

5.title: Episode #5.5

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: The six farmers plan special 24 hour dates for one of their partners. A heartfelt kiss surprises one partner, while an emergency of life or death for another partner stops romance dead in its tracks for their farmer.

6.title: Episode #5.6

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: As the 24 hour dates conclude, jealously erupts among some of the partners left behind, but some farmers have a pleasant surprise for them. The L word is used by farmer Nathan, farmer Becky finds love intensifying, and with Christy still fighting for her life in intensive care, farmer Charlie faces an anxious wait.

7.title: Episode #5.7

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: The farm stays come to an end, then one week later, each of the six farmers meet their remaining favourites in the city and get to know their families before four of them have to make the most important decision of their lives.

8.title: Episode #5.8

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: The six farmers return to the Hunter Valley, where their journeys for love began, to reveal their final favourites, open up their hearts, confess their feelings and reveal if they have found true love or let it slip away. In a first for the series, one farmer proposes to their favourite during their final romantic catch-up.

1.title: Episode #6.1

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Six new farmers, five male and one female, travel to the Hunter Valley, where they each meet eight potential partners in their search for love, romance and finding the one that they want. The farmers go on five-minute speed dates with each of their partners before choosing five to go with them to Sydney on a group date.

2.title: Episode #6.2

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: The six farmers and their five chosen partners travel to Sydney to attend a group date that reflects their farmer's personality. At the end of the day, each farmer chooses three of their dates to join them on the farm.

3.title: Episode #6.3

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: The six farmers and their three favourites arrive at the farm for a ten day stay and get down to business in no time. As the favourites are put to work, some find that the reality of farm life proves to be too difficult a transition.

4.title: Episode #6.4

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: Three days into the farm stays, the favourites make some last-minute plays for their farmers' hearts as the farmers struggle to make decisions about which one of their favourites they will send home.

5.title: Episode #6.5

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: The farmers make some of the most romantic gestures ever seen as they take a fresh approach to love. Some farmers struggle to choose between their final two favourites while others enlist the help of their family and friends. A devastating accident forces one farmer to say goodbye to one of their hopeful favourites.

6.title: Episode #6.6

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: Could Melia still find romance blossoming under the most trying of circumstances despite her mercy dash to hospital? The other five farmers take one of their favourites for an extended date off the farm as they move slowly toward making their final decisions.

7.title: Episode #6.7

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: Everyone is feeling the pressure in the last days of the farm stay. Some farmers have fallen hook, line and sinker for one city single, but others are still agonising about which of their favourites could most fulfill their heart's desires.

8.title: Episode #6.8

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: The farmers say goodbye to their remaining favourites, then one week later visit their one chosen favourite in their city home. A month later, the farmers return to the Hunter Valley, where their search for love began, and join host Natalie Gruzlewski on the couch to reveal who has had their heart broken and who has found the one that they want.

9.title: Reunion Special

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

9.plot: Natalie goes on a road trip around Australia to return to the homes of some of our favourite farmers from the first five seasons, including Chris, Macca and Jenny, the first female farmer. She finds out which farmers are still looking for love, which couples have gone the distance, and which ones have made the ultimate commitments, revealing their babies to us for the first time. One couple is about to say "I do", while another couple is expecting a child.

1.title: Episode #7.1

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Six new farmers travel to the Hunter Valley to begin their search for love. Some are looking for the first time, while others are hoping for a second chance. Each farmer meets the six potential partners they have chosen and goes on five-minute speed dates with each of them, but this time each farmer then goes on a seventh speed date with a girl chosen by their family before they decide which three girls will come to the farm.

2.title: Episode #7.2

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: The six farmers and their three favourites begin their week-long farm stays with the girls being put straight to work as the farmers begin to find out which of them are most suited to life on the land. Some friendships have already started to blossom before dinner on the first night, while the romance begins in earnest the next day with the first of the one-on-one dates.

3.title: Episode #7.3

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

3.plot: The six farmers are keen to make every moment with their three favourites count. Some farmers ask their family to meet the girls in order to help them make a tough decision about which one to send home. One farmer is left reeling when their decision is made for them by one of the favourites deciding to leave the farm.

4.title: Episode #7.4

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

4.plot: Five of the six farmers come face to face with the difficult choice of asking one of their three girls to leave the farm.

5.title: Episode #7.5

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

5.plot: With the weekend arriving, the farmers take a different approach to love as they go for some romantic overnight dates with their favourites. The competition for the farmers' hearts proves to be too much for one of the favourites to handle.

6.title: Episode #7.6

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

6.plot: Five of the farmers go on more romantic overnight dates, this time with their other favourites. With the farm stays coming to an end, everyone is feeling the pressure, and the competition for true love has never been tougher.

7.title: Episode #7.7

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

7.plot: After an emotional week on the farm, the morning comes when it's time for the farmers to say goodbye to their favourites, but not for too long - one week later, the farmers visit their favourites in their home cities, and meet their families and parents. When reality sets in, will love survive away from the farm?

8.title: Episode #7.8

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

8.plot: Two months after the city dates, the six farmers return to the place where their search for love began in the Hunter Valley, where they reveal to Natalie which girls have stolen their hearts. One of the farmers turns up alone, having had his heart broken. The farmers from season 5 reunite as one of our most remote farmers ever walks down the aisle to make love's ultimate commitment to the girl to whom he proposed just over a year ago during the final catch-up.

1.title: Episode #8.1

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

1.plot: Six new farmers travel to Byron Bay to meet host Natalie Gruzlewski and begin their search for love. In a first for the series, the farmers go on five-minute speed dates not only with their own favourites but all 36 girls who come looking for love. After a night-time soirée, the farmers choose three girls to bring to the farm. If more than one farmer chooses the same girl, she decides which farmer to go with.

2.title: Episode #8.2

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )

2.plot: The seventeen chosen girls arrive at the farms, where the farmers set them a group challenge, the winner of which receives the only one-on-one date with their farmer, leaving the losers to settle for a group date.

episode of.title: The Farmer Wants a Wife (TV Series 2007– )
